name: CheckboxMenuButton
desc: A menu item that combines a [Checkbox] widget with a [MenuItemButton].

fields.name: tristate
fields.desc: If true, then the checkbox's [value] can be true, false, or null.

fields.name: isError
fields.desc: True if this checkbox wants to show an error state.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the value of the checkbox should change.

fields.name: onHover
fields.desc: Called when a pointer enters or exits the button response area.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: Handler called when the focus changes.

fields.name: shortcut
fields.desc: The optional shortcut that selects this [MenuItemButton].

fields.name: trailingIcon
fields.desc: An optional icon to display after the [child] label.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget displayed in the center of this button.
